Player History
Signed as a free agent by Anaheim on 3/1/2001 to a minor league contract.
Injured on 5/5/2001 with a Strained Abdominal Muscle, out for one week...
Injured on 6/16/2001 with a Ruptured Tricep Tendon, out for 7 weeks...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against Boston on 7/13/2002...
Drove in 6 runs against Oakland on 10/2/2002...
Drafted in 7th round, 194th overall pick, by Seattle in 2009...
Injured on 6/27/2011 with a Pulled Hamstring Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Released by Seattle on 7/4/2011...
Drafted in 6th round, 161st overall pick, by Chicago (N) in 2012...
Injured on 8/26/2015 with a Bone Chips Shoulder, out for 5 weeks...
Injured on 8/18/2016 with a Tender Shoulder, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 5/1/2018 with a Strained Back Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 4/19/2019 with a Sore Shoulder, out for 1-2 weeks...
Drafted in 2nd round, 21st overall pick, by Los Angeles in 1977...
Traded from Los Angeles to Houston on 1/31/1981 (Going to LA: 3B J. Mumphrey, 2B J. Orta, P J. Palmer. Going to HOU: P C. Speck, C G. Goossen, 2B D. Garcia, CF R. Craig)...
Had first career hit on 4/1/1984, off Rich Gossage (NYM)...
Hit first career homerun on 5/19/1984, off John Verhoeven (ATL)...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/1/1984, hitting .550 with 1 HR, 5 RBI...
Injured on 4/11/1985 with a Pulled Back Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Traded from Houston to Chicago (N) on 3/2/1988 (Going to HOU: 2B G. Jefferies. Going to CHC: 3B R. Craig, RF R. Bryant)...
Injured on 8/24/1989 with a Inflamed Posterior Cruciate Ligament, out for 6-7 weeks...
Injured on 5/7/1990 with a Hyper Extended Elbow, out for 1-2 weeks...
Drove in 6 runs against New York (N) on 9/10/1990...
Injured on 10/16/1991 with a Strained Bicep Muscle, out for 2 weeks...
Injured on 6/1/1994 with a Stiff Shoulder, out for one week...
